attributes.action: allow the reporting of Mobile Phones whilst driving offenders to lead to a conviction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow the reporting of Mobile Phones whilst driving offenders to lead to a conviction. If 5 or more people report a person for using a mobile phone whilst driving a motor vehicle then that person would be convicted for the offence. We must all take responsibility for a safer world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
